item.title: Maui braces for possible end to FEMA rental assistance
item.description: Nearly 1,000 households displaced by Maui's wildfires are anxiously awaiting news on federal assistance

item.title: Demonstrator injured after federal agent fired projectile from close range during California protest
item.description: A demonstrator was hit in the face with a projectile fired by a federal officer at close range during a protest in Southern California
